pro_tips.tip: Start each day with a few minutes of mindfulness to set a positive tone.
Stay hydrated throughout the day to keep energy levels and mood balanced.
Take regular breaks to stretch and breathe deeply, especially during long work hours.
Get outdoors daily, even for a short walk, to boost mental clarity and physical health.
